testcase.name: Check the service PUT method
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseUpdate = read ('classpath:Karate/request/responseUpdate.json') . passed * def requestBodyUpdate = read ('classpath:Karate/request/requestBodyUpdate.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestBodyUpdate ............................................. passed When method PUT ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseUpdate ...................................... passed And assert response.id == requestBodyUpdate.id ............................ passed And assert response.name == requestBodyUpdate.name ........................ passed And assert response.category.id == requestBodyUpdate.category.id .......... passed And assert response.category.name == requestBodyUpdate.category.name ...... passed And assert response.tags.id == requestBodyUpdate.tags.id .................. passed And assert response.tags.name == requestBodyUpdate.tags.name .............. passed And assert response.status == requestBodyUpdate.status .................... passed

testcase.name: PUT a pet with incorrect values at id
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def responseUpdate = read ('classpath:Karate/request/responseUpdate.json') . passed * def requestBodyUpdate = read ('classpath:Karate/request/requestBodyUpdate.json') . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestBodyUpdate ............................................. passed When method PUT ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseUpdate ...................................... passed And assert response.id == requestBodyUpdate.id ............................ passed And assert response.name == requestBodyUpdate.name ........................ passed And assert response.category.id == requestBodyUpdate.category.id .......... passed And assert response.category.name == requestBodyUpdate.category.name ...... passed And assert response.tags.id == requestBodyUpdate.tags.id .................. passed And assert response.tags.name == requestBodyUpdate.tags.name .............. passed And assert response.status == requestBodyUpdate.status .................... passed * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestBody = {"id": "@$%^", "category": {"id": 22,"name": '#(nameCategory)'},"name": "luna*/_","photoUrls": ["string"],"tags": [{"id":7854,"name": '#(nameTags)'}],"status": "string"} . passed Given path 'pet' .......................................................... passed And request requestBody ................................................... passed When method put ........................................................... passed Then status 500 ........................................................... passed And match response == {"code": "#number","type": "#string","message": "#string"} . passed
